biotools.summary: CyPathia is a cytoscape app, that provides a user friendly and straightforward interface. The CyPathia app is based on Hipathia Bioconductor package, allowing the Cytoscape community the possibility of using mechanistic models.

bioschemas.name: CyPathia
bioschemas.summary: CyPathia is a cytoscape app, that provides a user friendly and straightforward interface. The CyPathia app is based on Hipathia Bioconductor package, allowing the Cytoscape community the possibility of using mechanistic models.
